text_block_list.text:
Today at the Selection Race, many trainers were 
rushing to see the horse girls' abilities.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ohhohoho! Everyone, burn it into your eyes! 
The running of the first-class horse girl, King Halo!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text: You're full of energy as always huh, King-chan!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of～course! 
I slept plenty and my preparations are perfect!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I entered all 12 Selection Races today, I'll show the 
trainers King's brave figure as many times as I want!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Eh!? 
You're gonna run in all the races today!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Yes, that was my intention? After all, the more races 
I enter the higher my chance of being scouted will be!

text_block_list.name: Special Week
text_block_list.text:
Huh? But I heard we have to limit our 
registrations to one or else we'll be disqualified…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: …Eh?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: I, I never heard about this～!!

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: …As expected of the young lady, unconventional～.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
But, her mother is the "first-class" legendary horse 
girl isn't she! I just hope she can show she's inherited 
her abilities in this race…
And thus, the curtain on the Selection Race rises.
(Start!)

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
And they're off, it's the 1600m turf Selection Race! 
Which horse girl will display their abilities this time?

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
It's a slow start this time. 
The first pack is moving grouped together.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Gh… Ha… Ha…!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
King Halo is also on the inside of the group! But she 
seems to be having a hard time being blocked from the front!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Kh, hey! 
You've got some guts getting in King's way!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
Hmm… King Halo, it seems like she wants 
to move up but her positioning isn't very good.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
She boasted a lot about "first-class this first-class that" but 
she doesn't seem very dexterous. It looks like her spirit is all 
she has going for her…

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text: or on the contrary, she's too prideful for her own good…

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
What's wrong with King Halo? She hasn't started chasing yet! 
Soon the front will have left her behind!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Eh? They left already!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ahh, geez!! 
My pace is completely ruined! Kh!

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
King Halo has finally started her spurt!! 
This is an amazing stretch! Truly wonderful footwork!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of course… 
I am, the very definition of a Kiiing!!!

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
Ohh, this is amazing! She's caught up all in one go!! 
So she really did have it in her!
It was a beautiful last leg.
A sharp burst that shocked even the horse girl a furlong ahead.

It's still rough but, if I can see her running 
on the big stage… just maybe…

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text:
But it looks like the engine started too late! 
The front reaches the goal! King Halo comes in 2nd!!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ah… Ha… Ha… 
…Kh.
choice_data_list: That was a beautiful last leg…!
That was a beautiful last leg…!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Of course it was, just who do you think I am? But, this 
outcome is no good… for King to let it end with 2nd!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Wait, huh? You're… from the other day. 
…Don't tell me, you've come to scout me!?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Ufufu, joining the winning team right away, huh! 
Very well, I'll give you the right to promote King yourself!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Now, tell me. 
Just what kind of trainer do you intend to become?
choice_data_list: I want to see you win on a big stage.
I want to see you win on a big stage.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Wrong.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I didn't ask what you want me to do. 
I asked what you wanted to do.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: With an answer of that level, I'll have to refuse.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
I won't acknowledge anything less than a first-class trainer. 
I have to decide you don't currently fit those qualifications.
choice_data_list: Right now, I'm still a rookie but someday I'll be first-class!
Right now, I'm still a rookie but someday I'll be first-class!

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Someday, huh. When?

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
If you trainers think we're not good enough, you can always move 
onto the next girl and have another chance at being evaluated as 
a first-class trainer.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
But to horse girls, we've only got one chance. 
We have to make sure we leave an impact.

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text:
King! Sorry to interrupt your conversation! 
Your phone was ringing…

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
…My, is that so. Thank you for letting me know. 
I'll be there in a second, so wait for me.

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text:
Well then, I'll be excusing myself. 
Goodbye.

text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A
text_block_list.text:
You got dumped spectacularly… well, don't let it 
bother you. Hat young lady has spunk, but I'd say 
a G2 or G3 are the height of her abilities.

text_block_list.name: Experienced Trainer B
text_block_list.text:
It's a typical big frog in a small pond. Her pride 
is too high for her abilities. That girl's gonna 
have a hard time, give it a rest.
The trainers around me give their condolences.

But in my head, the words she left about "qualifications as a 
first-class trainer" continued to circulate…
